Alexandria.Divine Mercy University:
Divine Mercy University (DMU) is a private Catholic graduate university of psychology and counseling located in Arlington, Virginia in the United States.


== Mission ==
DMU seeks to further the science and professional practice of psychology and counseling, through the integration of Catholic-Christian anthropology, philosophy, and theology. The need for mental health practitioners with a firm and comprehensive understanding of Catholic teaching, culture, and history inspired the establishment of this institution.
